name: Petoink
description:
Petoink.

Project for lowrezjam 2018. Made in collaboration with MaoAlz

(Press R to restart the level)

Controls:
Left/Right = Move
Z/Up = Jump | Transfer ink to tank
X = Shoot ink
C/Down = Crawl | Leave pressed to snort ink | Transfer from tank

How to play:
You must sniff all the ink within the level and transfer it back to each corresponding tank, note that there are 3 separate ink colors and as you sniff them, they will be stacked in your bar (First in first out). Enemies are made of ink so they count too!

Wish I had more time to make sound/music though I'm still happy with what we achieved.
Might update with further content after the jam votations
